overview: In a society organized for isolation, Adalgiza anchors his time in his apartment, lives in a world of four walls, in the serene illusion that controls him.  However, faster than the ringing of the bell, the whole bubble of calm in which you risk bursting.  Opening the door, Adalgiza, without realizing it, would no longer have as many empty spaces and could even feel the beginning of the awakening of her soft dream.
title: Adalgiza
